Text: Investment companies are claiming they suffered major losses caused by false accounting that wiped nearly £2 billion ($2.5 billion) off Tesco's value in 2014. (AP) Lawyers for Britain's largest retailer said at the start of the three-day High Court hearing that none of the fund operators involved were the legal owners of the Tesco PLC shares they are suing over.
Cause: Investment companies are claiming they suffered major losses caused by false accounting
Effect: wiped nearly £2 billion ($2.5 billion) off Tesco's value in 2014.
Sentence: <e1>Investment companies are claiming they suffered major losses caused by false accounting</e1> that <e2>wiped nearly £2 billion ($2.5 billion) off Tesco's value in 2014.</e2> (AP) Lawyers for Britain's largest retailer said at the start of the three-day High Court hearing that none of the fund operators involved were the legal owners of the Tesco PLC shares they are suing over.
